name: SupportJoshuaAndDoggo
_source: speak;Joshua;Well, well...|what do we have here?|A hellhound, huh? Don't see those every day.
speak;Joshua;Name's Joshua. You're that {v:DoggoName} everyone's been talking about, right?
speak;Joshua;Heh, friendly little guy, aren't ya?|Most folks would be running screaming by now.
speak;Joshua;Tell you what, {v:DoggoName}.|How about we make this interesting?
speak;Joshua;I'll flip this coin.|Heads, you fetch it.|Tails...well, tails you still fetch it, but I'll give you a treat.
speak;Joshua;Good boy. Here's that treat I promised.|You know, {v:DoggoName}, you might be alright.
speak;Joshua;Don't get too attached though.|I'm just a wandering mercenary.|Here today, gone tomorrow.
speak;Joshua;But...|I suppose there's no harm in a game or two while I'm around.
speak;Joshua;Yeah, I bet that thick fur doesn't help.|Come here, boy.|There's shade enough for both of us.
speak;Joshua;You know, back in Jehanna, we had regular dogs.|But nothing quite like you.
speak;Joshua;Ever played poker, {v:DoggoName}?|'Course not, you can't hold cards with paws.
speak;Joshua;Tell you what though...|I'll throw this card, if you can fetch this card from over there...|I'll split my rations with you tonight.
speak;Joshua;Careful with those teeth now.|These cards have been with me since...well, since before this whole war started.
speak;Joshua;Not bad!|Barely a tooth mark.|You're getting good at this gentle mouth thing.
speak;Joshua;You know what, {v:DoggoName}?|I'm starting to think you bring me luck.
speak;Joshua;Ever since we started these little games...|My coin flips have been coming up in my favor more often.
speak;Joshua;Maybe I should keep you around.|Every gambler needs a lucky charm, right?
speak;Joshua;Hey {v:DoggoName}.|Come sit with me for a minute.
speak;Joshua;Been thinking about after this war ends.|About going home to Jehanna.
speak;Joshua;Thing is...I'm not the same person who left.|And I don't think I want to go back to just...drifting around.
speak;Joshua;Remember this?|This coin I've been flipping?|This old thing's been with me through everything.
speak;Joshua;But lately, I've realized something.|My luck didn't come from this coin.|It came from finding good people to fight alongside.
speak;Joshua;People like you, boy.|Never thought I'd be calling a hellhound "people," but here we are.
speak;Joshua;You've been the most loyal friend I've had in years.|Never asked for anything but a game of fetch and a kind word.
speak;Joshua;Tell you what, {v:DoggoName}.|When this war's over, how about you come with me?|We'll see the world together.|Just a wanderer and his faithful hound.
speak;Joshua;Heads or tails, we'll make our own luck.|What do you say, partner?
speak;Joshua;That's what I like to hear.|Joshua and {v:DoggoName}, the luckiest pair on Magvel.
speak;Joshua;Now go fetch, boy.|We've got plenty more games ahead of us.
